code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddTransaction=_ref=>{let{onAdd}=_ref;const[description,setDescription]=useState('');const[amount,setAmount]=useState('');const[type,setType]=useState('income');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onAdd({description,amount:parseFloat(amount),type});setDescription('');setAmount('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Description",value:description,onChange:e=>setDescription(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Amount",value:amount,onChange:e=>setAmount(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:type,onChange:e=>setType(e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"income",children:"Income"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"expense",children:"Expense"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Transaction"})]});};export default AddTransaction;
